basnahira palath sabhawa idiriyedi wisuruwa harimata niyamithaya, basnahira palatha sandaha eksath jathika pakshayen nadisha hemamali nam dana ugath, winitha , buddhimath thanaththiya idiripath wana bawa paksha abhyantharaya pawasayi, ejapaya ho basnahira ejapa pakshikayan gana kathakarannata deyak ithiriwa natha, ee basnahirata ayath gampaha disthrikkaya nadisha hemamalima wan dana ugath buddhimath kanthawak parlimenthuwatada yawa atha, aa upekasha swarnamaliya, apa aa handunanne paba lesaya, sabawinma ayada mal pabawaki, me karaliyata enne aata wada ‚Äúmale mal‚Äú pabawaki,- deshapalanaya pinisa sudusukam lesa ganenne kapawimata wada alawima nam aa tharam thawath sudusu charithayak natha, ee baw anunkeli akarshawata (samawenna anarkali aakarsha )manawa pasugiya kalaye manawa gamya karana ladi,ejapaya bunnathya, ee bunnath bawa nirawathin wasa ganimata ejapaya ganna ‚Äúsakkili‚Äú thiranayaki me nadisha hemamali mathiwaranaya sandaha idiripath kirima, nadishata amatharawa nilmini thennakon ganada rawayak mathuwemin pawathi,idiriyedi mathi amathiwaru siyallatama laba dena waraprasada walata amatharawa nomile lingika roga sayana, upadeshana sewa kriyathmaka kirimata wishala wiyadamak darimata siduwe, eya patawenneda janathawa mathaya, dan parlimenthuwa ‚Äúool in wan‚Äú pakejayaki, mudal yahamin wiyadamkota diyawannawa tharanaya kara thirubadu rahitha wahanaye sita palamu panthiye ganikawa dakwa athishya sukhopabhogi jiwana ratawakata himikam kiwa haka,upeksha ,githa, anarkali,nilmini ta amatharawa sudharmada me mathiwarana sandaha enne nam hulata pawa hithata sahanayak genadenawa atha, eya ratak lesa apa sathutu wiya yuthu karanawaki,ejapaya pissan kotuwak wi awasanya, nadagamak wi boho kalya, apa wani paramparika ejapa pakshikayanta dan siduwa aththe samajika kad patha puchcha nalale alu ga ganimaya, athi uthum basnahira ejapa janathawa pabawa men me nadishawada parlimenthuwa dakwa gena yanawa noanumanaya, ehew janathawata jathiyeth antharjathikawath uththamacharaya himi wiya yuthuya,....!!
